Trading platforms

Forex24 pioneered the offering of an MT4 platform with trading execution quality in mind. Trade on MT4 with No Requotes, No Rejections with flexible leverage ranging from 1:1 – to 400:1

Webtrader platform

Forex24 Global is providing a new web based trading platform that runs on both PC and Mac. This platform, which can be accessed using clients’ existing mt4 logins, broadens our reach and addresses some ongoing needs of our clients who require a stable and flexible trading solution to access global forex markets.

Start trading Read more
Mobile platform

Forex24 Global Mobile offers your traders the same account capabilities as Forex24 Global Webtrader. You can view their account status, closed trades, place and monitor pending orders, execute and modify live trades, and more!

Start trading Read more
Desktop

MetaTrader is the most popular front-end application in the industry. Forex24 MT4 has taken the MetaTrader MT4 platform and introduced its liquidity to create a user-friendly front-end trading interface with interbank liquidity and fast execution.

Start trading Read more
ZuluTrade Social Trading Platform

ZuluTrade is an online trading platform that enables users to locate or subscribe to top performing traders.

A trader can execute trades manually or allocate a desirable amount to follow top performing traders, therefore diversifying the investment. The trader can also set risk management parameters in advance of any trading activity, in order to shield against any volatile trading strategy.

Start trading Read more

Risk warning:

Trading in Contracts for Difference (‘CFDs’) carries a high level of risk and can result in the loss of all your investment. As such, CFDs may not be appropriate for all investors. You should not invest money that you cannot afford to lose. Before deciding to trade, you should become aware of all the risks associated with CFD trading, and seek advice from an independent and suitably licensed financial advisor. Under no circumstances shall we have any liability to any person or entity for (a) any loss or damage in whole or part caused by, resulting from, or relating to any transactions related to CFDs or (b) any direct, indirect, special, consequential or incidental damages whatsoever. For more information about the risks associated with trading CFDs please find and read our ‘General Risk Disclosure’.

Forex24 Global does not provide services to residents of the USA, Canada, Japan, North Korea, Iran, Belgium and some other regions.
